name: infertile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An infertile person, animal, or plant cannot have babies, produce young, or produce new plants: It has been estimated that one in eight couples is infertile.
Infertile land or soil is not good enough for plants or crops to grow well there: infertile soil Poor farmers have little choice but to try to grow food in this infertile soil.
